price: ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߟߋ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߝߘߊߝߘߊߣߍ߲ ߞߐߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ ߟߏ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߛߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߦߌ߬ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
